summary: Contoso Wireless offers a variety of upgrade services for customers looking to upgrade their TVs. They offer the latest models from top brands such as Samsung, LG, and Sony with features including ultra-high definition picture quality, voice control, smart home compatibility, and advanced gaming features. Payment options include all major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and 0% financing for 12 months on purchases over $500. Additionally, all TVs come with a two-year warranty and 30-day money back guarantee.
